yacl3.config.yttrium:config.flipSelf.des: If enabled, your own player model will be flipped
yacl3.config.yttrium:config.flipOthers.d: If enabled, player models of other players will be flipped
yacl3.config.yttrium:config.flipMobs.des: If enabled, models of mobs will be flipped
yacl3.config.yttrium:config.starSeed.des: The seed used when generating stars in the sky
yacl3.config.yttrium:config.starCount.de: The number of stars that will be generated in the sky
yacl3.config.yttrium:config.maxPlayerLis: The maximum entries in the player list, set to 0 for no limit
The maximum rows in the player list
yacl3.config.yttrium:config.playerListHe: Custom text to override the player list header, supports MiniMessage
yacl3.config.yttrium:config.playerListFo: Custom text to override the player list footer, supports MiniMessage
yacl3.config.yttrium:config.renderSpecta: If enabled, the crosshair will be rendered at all times when in spectator
yacl3.config.yttrium:config.modifyZAxisC: If enabled, the Z axis on the debug menu crosshair will be a pure blue in line with the other axes
yacl3.config.yttrium:config.renderTotalE: If enabled, your experience level will have your total experience points shown next to it
The string that your client will identify to servers as, leave blank for vanilla
yacl3.config.yttrium:config.removeFishin: If enabled, fishing bobbers that are inside your player's head will be hidden so they do not obstruct your vision
yacl3.config.yttrium:config.nullMovement: If enabled, opposing movement keys (W and S, or A and D) will not cancel each other's movement
